quote: I joined Design at UCI to challenge myself and promote design culture in tech. Starting as a Workshop Coordinator, I grew into the role of Design-a-thon Director, leading a team from 1 to 40 members. My goal is to inspire designers to turn their projects into lasting ventures.
name: Krey Pillei

quote: Design at UCI has introduced me to one of my favorite and supportive communities on campus. The club has helped transform my interest in design from a hobby into a skillset I can apply in meaningful ways, while also giving me valuable knowledge, experience, and connections.
name: Jasmine Wu

quote: Engaging with designers across various specializations provided valuable insights and sparked new ideas. It was fascinating to see how different design perspectives come together, making it a unique and inspiring opportunity for both personal and professional growth.
name: Vimala Machiraju
